entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
